beans.description:
Spring quartz配置:
<!-- quartz配置定时任务调度 --> <bean id="testQuartz" class="org.jee.test.AbstractTest"> </bean>
<bean id="testQuartzTask" class="org.springframework.scheduling.quartz.MethodInvokingJobDetailFactoryBean"> <property name="targetObject" ref="testQuartz"/> <property name="targetMethod" value="test"/> <property name="concurrent" value="false"/> </bean>
<bean id="testQuartzDoTime" class="org.springframework.scheduling.quartz.CronTriggerBean"> <property name="jobDetail" ref="testQuartzTask"/> <property name="cronExpression" value="0 0 3 * * ? *"/> </bean>
<!-- 总管理类，如果将lazy-init='false'那么容器启动就会执行调度程序 --> <bean id="startQuertz" lazy-init="false" class="org.springframework.scheduling.quartz.SchedulerFactoryBean"> <property name="triggers"> <list> <ref bean="testQuartzDoTime"/> </list> </property> </bean>
